text: Cupid's Target is a 1915 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Oliver Hardy - Bob (as Babe Hardy) * Frances Ne Moyer - Lucy * Jerold T. Hevener - Marty * Harry Lorraine - Waters * C. W. Ritchie ==See also== * List of American films of 1915 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1915 comedy films Category:1915 short films Category:American comedy films Category:Lubin Manufacturing Company films Category:Comedy short films
title: Cupid's Target
